mods.abstract: Photograph on Page 50 shows an exhibition of the Boy's Pig Club at the Louisiana State Fair in Shreveport. Show pigs occupy rows of stock pens inside a large pavilion where well-dressed spectators view the exhibits.
mods.note: Alternate view of this photograph found on Page 49, image 247.; Compare photograph to the following publication. Balis, W.H. (1914, March) Pig Clubs in Louisiana. University Bulletin, Vol. 5, N.S. (No. 3), pp. 1-15. Retrieved August 4, 2014, from https://archive.org/stream/pigclubsinlouisi00loui#page/1/mode/2up

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
